GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.10.142
GSD.description:
xen/grants: prevent integer overflow in gnttab_dma_alloc_pages()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.142 by commit 5d0d46e6255aa87bbca0e6831648dcecd2a7ebfd, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit b3f7931f5c61ba39e81a5c958bf5d65ebb1838af. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: xen/grants: prevent integer overflow in gnttab_dma_alloc_pages()
